answers.answer: Hello and welcome, theres no doctors here but someone might be able to help you. Sorry but all i know is you need to see a hepatologist. Their usually at teaching hospitals. Best of luck to you.

I showed high ferritin last test a week ago. I called the doc and they said don't sweat it during tx . The other test I have no clue on. Sorry to hear about your husband and your sufferin . This iron thing can drive ya crazy, there are three test on this tibc, iron, iron saturatin,  besides the  ferritin test.  Were the others 3 high?

thnks for responding guys.  But here in Ocala Florida we have very poor quality doctors.  I will have to follow uop with my endo.  Im sure Ill be retested but to leave me hanging with nothing has me very anxious.  She did mention something about hemochrom something.  I didnt understand I was numb............'Ill let you know when I know more.  God Bless
hemachromtosis , a disorder where the body stores to much iron.  link, http://digestive.niddk.nih.gov/diseases/hemachromtosis/index.htm

Are you treating for the hep c? If so, I think the high ferritin may be cause by that. Mine is really high right now - probably induced by treatment. I'll be retesting 6 mos post treatment, then follow up by testing for hemachromtosis if it's still high. In any event I don't think it's too worrisome if monitored.Good luck!

question: I have no clue what a high ferritin level means other than high iron.I have a history of a fatty liver, was told I had an hymangioma on the liver but had an ok biopsy.  Except I had multiple spasams after the biopsy.My husband died of Hep C 7 years ago.  I was tested until he was dead for 4 years.  Please help Im scared to death.  The doctor I saw was not any help to me at all.I have type 11 diabetes and have had several episodes of spasms, I also recently had a endoscopy and a colonoscopy.  The later was fien ethe endoscopy showed six small ulcers.  Please tell me how to go about help for this the level was almost 300.  Have had high alt and spgt but not terrible 55 and 120.  Thanks youCarole
title: High ferritin levels for the first time
